articles.author: Tim Benz
articles.title: Madden Monday: Steelers' upset of Colts 'goes a long way into them convincing themselves' - TribLIVE.com
articles.description: The ripple effect from the Pittsburgh Steelers’ 27-20 win over the Indianapolis Colts (7-2) goes beyond the standings. That’s the view of 105.9 The X’s Mark Madden during this week’s TribLive “Madden Monday” podcast. Sure. …

articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.title: Struggling to retain information after reading? Doing a simple thing can help, says top doc - The Times of India
articles.description: Exercising a few hours after studying, but not immediately, significantly boosts memory retention. Research published in the NIH indicates this timing
